local_intent: Verify gentle contact by lowering until contact is detected, confirming via force threshold, with limited retries.
assumptions: Gripper is open and above the cloth area
Safe clearance to descend up to 0.05
Camera can provide visibility or allow raster scan recovery
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan's contact step: visibility check with raster recovery, approach above cloth, then slow descent until contact (threshold 10) and verification; retries the contact step if not detected, consistent with failure recovery.
